bibl.title: Gold in Ptolemaic Egypt: Exchange Practices in Light of P.Cair.Zen. I 59021.
bibl.note: ""The present text illustrates the consequences arising from the application of the royal πρόσταγμα which was decreed under Ptolemy II Philadelphus (at any rate, prior to 258 BC) and which imposed the exchange of foreign, precious metal coins into local coinage.""
bibl.seg: Katerina Panagopoulou, Gold in Ptolemaic Egypt: Exchange Practices in Light of P.Cair.Zen. I 59021.

""The present text illustrates the consequences arising from the application of the royal πρόσταγμα which was decreed under Ptolemy II Philadelphus (at any rate, prior to 258 BC) and which imposed the exchange of foreign, precious metal coins into local coinage.""
